attributes.action: All MPs should seek re-selection before the next General Election
attributes.additional_details: The people of this county, regardless of whether they are for or against the UK leaving the EU have become totally frustrated by the machinations of MPs who appear to vote supporting their own opinions rather than those of the people have elected them.
attributes.background: In view of the dissatisfaction felt by most of the country over the 2016 referendum & subsequent negotiations, every MP should be de-selected & seek re-selection by their local parties before the next General Election.

rejection.details: This is a decision for political parties, not the UK Government or Parliament.
